name: XWUI Command Component
description: Command palette/command menu component for quick actions and navigation. Features searchable command list with keyboard navigation. Supports icons, descriptions, and keywords for filtering. Uses XWUIInput and XWUIList internally.

conf_comp.title: Component Configuration (conf_comp)
conf_comp.description: Component-specific settings set when initializing the component

placeholder.description: Placeholder text for the search input

className.description: Additional CSS class name for the command component

data.title: Component Data
data.description: Data to update the component, set when initializing the component

items.description: Array of command items to display

icon.description: SVG icon HTML string for the command

action.description: Action function to execute (not serializable in JSON)
